name: Portfolio Website
description: A modern, responsive portfolio to showcase my skills, projects, and contact details. Includes animations and dark mode support.

name: Transcend: Healthcare
description: Built a responsive healthcare site using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and Strapi CMS with dynamic routing, multi-language support, and URL-based navbar switching for a seamless user experience.

name: HyperBlock
description: Developed Hyperblock using Next.js and Tailwind CSS with Framer Motion animations, real-time notifications via React Hot Toast, secure ME API integration, and interactive UI using Flowbite and Swiper.js for a fast, scalable user experience.

name: SevenKoncecpts
description: Developed the Seven Koncepts website using HTML, Bootstrap, and React with API integration, Context API, and Swiper.js sliders to showcase digital services in a modern, responsive, and visually engaging layout.

name: Bombay Fifty
description: Developed Bombay Fifty, a responsive restaurant service page using HTML, Bootstrap, and JavaScript with API integration for dynamic content, smooth form handling, and a clean, engaging UI that reflects the brand's identity.

name: Grabzer
description: Developed a multi-language Next.js app with i18n support, Axios-based dynamic API handling, Context API for global state, and user auth via ME API, styled using Bootstrap & Tailwind for a responsive UI.

name: Lb-908
description: Built Lb908, a responsive business promotion dashboard using HTML, Bootstrap, and JavaScript with dynamic business listing via API, user registration, shout-out features, and profile management for small business visibility.

name: Dashboard Grabzer
description: Developed a dynamic Admin Panel using Next.js with secure JWT authentication, global state management via Context API, and a responsive UI built with Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap, optimized for performance and scalability.
